title: Womens Dress
title_original: Arach&Cloz Women's Wool Blend Fall Seamless Rip Resistant Warm Layered Tops Business Casual Sweaters

specs.Best Sellers Rank: #61,795 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ( See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ) #762 in Women's Pullover Sweaters

category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > Women > Clothing > Sweaters > Pullovers

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater classy, soft, and comfortable, with one mentioning there are no annoying itchy tags. The color receives positive feedback. The length receives mixed reviews, with several customers noting it's too short.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Obsessed with this brand!!
items.body: I am obsessed with this brand. I LOVE clothes that look classy and are comfy and wanted some fall/winter tops that would look professional enough for work and these fit the bill. Great for fall or winter, casual or work, super soft, warm, slightly pricey but honestly worth it and I try to catch them on sale. All the colors are classy and beautiful and it's a super soft comfy sweater material with medium thickness. I am 5'4, 145lbs and typically a medium. I started with a medium and it fit but was a little loose in weird places so I sized down to a small which fits much better. Read more
items.author: Mama Struck

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warm and classy sweater
items.body: Very soft and comfortable. Fits like a second skin. Love Arach&Cloz Read more
items.author: Katerina

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Too short and a bit itchy
items.body: Nice looking top. Soft, like brushed kind. Flat seams all around. Beautiful color. Unfortunately, for me the fabric was itchy. And it's too short for me. Other Arach&Cloz tops much longer (I have different ones). Read more
items.author: ER

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super comfy and cozy!
items.body: True to size, super comfortable, very stretchy, and just overall very cute! Itâ€™s like a small turtle neck, in my opinion; it doesnâ€™t go up very high but itâ€™s noticeably higher than a normal crew neck. Iâ€™ll definitely be buying more in the future. Read more
items.author: Geek

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dreamy soft top perfect for traveling
items.body: This top is a lightweight extra dreamy soft sweater with no annoying itchy tags. It washes well and maintains it shape. The neckline is perfectly high crew neck. Itâ€™s traveling well - no wrinkles! ðŸ˜€ðŸ‘ðŸ¼ðŸ§¡ Going to buy some more of these tops. Read more
items.author: Alex D

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Too short in torso looks like petite sizing.
items.body: I am 5'7 150 lbs with a curvy figure. I ordered a medium. When I tried it on I found it very short in the torso to the point that keeping the bottom tucked in will be impossible. As shown in my pictures you can see even the arms are longer than the sweater itself. Its almost like a petite sizing but then the arms would be too long. Also the armpits are way to low causing the shirt to bag weirdly in the armpit area. If I were to try to go up a size this would make this problem even worse. Overall I can not suggest this top to anyone which is a shame because the material itself is so soft and comfy feeling. Read more
items.author: Charles D. Paynter

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect For Layering
items.body: Nice weight to the fabric but I wouldn't call it opaque. For me like a glove. I got the black and am going to purchase the other colors as well. The color is a very rich black and hopefully it won't fade after a few gentle washes. Will keep you updated. Read more
items.author: Sheree

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: A-apricot, Off-white, A-caramel, A-black, A-blue, A-camel, A-coffee, A-dark Red, A-gray, A-navy. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
